医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Bedfont Scientific Ltd. 和 NewMed Ltd. 自豪地为肯特之心临终关怀医院筹集超过 28,000 英镑的资金https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Bedfont-Scientific-Ltd-and-NewMed-Ltd-Proudly-Raise-Over-c2a328000-in-Funds-for-Heart-of-Kent-Hospice。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Bedfont-Scientific-Ltd-and-NewMed-Ltd-Proudly-Raise-Over-c2a328000-in-Funds-for-Heart-of-Kent-Hospice。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f5b12a0-e0b4-4311-8a85-8a5c94e22603 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 11:31:00 -0400 Bedfont Scientific Ltd. and NewMed Ltd. Proudly Raise Over £28,000 in Funds for Heart of Kent Hospice
用鸟枪法自上而下的蛋白质组学解决重要的心脏生物学问题在 2024 年 Pittcon 大会上进行的采访中，我们采访了 John Yates 教授，讨论了如何通过鸟枪法自上而下的蛋白质组学捕获心肌细胞的细胞间异质性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Addressing-Important-Cardiac-Biology-Questions-with-Shotgun-Top-Down-Proteomics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Addressing-Important-Cardiac-Biology-Questions-with-Shotgun-Top-Down-Proteomics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b652e1fc-17e7-4dd9-8a0e-29b464575a8d Tue, 06 Aug 2024 10:46:00 -0400 Addressing Important Cardiac Biology Questions with Shotgun Top-Down Proteomics
Beckman Coulter Life Sciences 和 Illumina 推出 TruSight Oncology 500 DNA/RNA 应用程序加速肿瘤学研究https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-and-Illumina-Accelerate-Oncology-Research-with-Launch-of-TruSight-Oncology-500-DNARNA-Application。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-and-Illumina-Accelerate-Oncology-Research-with-Launch-of-TruSight-Oncology-500-DNARNA-Application。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6eb2f00-29eb-47d4-afd9-7662342e5976 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 09:05:00 -0400 Beckman Coulter Life Sciences and Illumina Accelerate Oncology Research with Launch of TruSight Oncology 500 DNA/RNA Application
使用布里渊光散射光谱测量 COVID-19 中的血浆粘度由维也纳 MedUni 领导的一个研究小组在一项研究中表明，对血浆粘度的纯光学测量可以提供有关 COVID-19 严重程度和进展的信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Measuring-blood-plasma-viscosity-in-COVID-19-using-Brillouin-light-scattering-spectroscopy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Measuring-blood-plasma-viscosity-in-COVID-19-using-Brillouin-light-scattering-spectroscopy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f72386b7-80db-4e14-9214-04d4ee47e2a6 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 07:57:00 -0400 Measuring blood plasma viscosity in COVID-19 using Brillouin light scattering spectroscopy
Cap-QuIC：一种用于早期检测神经退行性疾病的新型视觉诊断技术明尼苏达大学的研究人员开发了一种新的视觉诊断技术，可用于推进神经退行性疾病（如帕金森病）和影响动物的类似疾病（包括鹿的慢性消耗性疾病）的早期检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Cap-QuIC-A-new-visual-diagnostic-technique-for-early-detection-of-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Cap-QuIC-A-new-visual-diagnostic-technique-for-early-detection-of-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=463bdc3b-1818-4da1-9bff-c9a61481c265 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 07:41:59 -0400 Cap-QuIC: A new visual diagnostic technique for early detection of neurodegenerative diseases
癫痫和怀孕：评估北欧大型数据集中增加的风险和结果但具体风险有多大还不太清楚。出于伦理原因，随机临床试验被排除，观察性研究需要非常大的人群基础来量化相对罕见的事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Epilepsy-and-pregnancy-Evaluating-increased-risks-and-outcomes-in-a-large-Nordic-dataset.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Epilepsy-and-pregnancy-Evaluating-increased-risks-and-outcomes-in-a-large-Nordic-dataset.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d04e1d7c-fb4f-4b5f-b839-653df456bcf5 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 07:30:00 -0400 Epilepsy and pregnancy: Evaluating increased risks and outcomes in a large Nordic dataset
2025 年项目内部：前特朗普官员概述了反对堕胎的强硬右转罗杰·塞维里诺（Roger Severino）在特朗普政府卫生与公共服务部任职，为自己赢得了一个颇具争议的名声，他致力于保护那些因宗教原因拒绝执行包括堕胎在内的医疗程序的卫生工作者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Inside-Project-2025-Former-Trump-Official-Outlines-Hard-Right-Turn-Against-Abortion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Inside-Project-2025-Former-Trump-Official-Outlines-Hard-Right-Turn-Against-Abortion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=770dc0fc-c1c5-4a07-9dc4-529b1b87544d Tue, 06 Aug 2024 07:02:00 -0400 Inside project 2025: Former Trump official outlines hard right turn against abortion
美国原住民公共卫生官员陷入数据盲点如果无法获得良好的数据，做出公共卫生决策并不容易。美洲原住民社区的流行病学家和公共卫生工作者表示，他们常常一无所知，因为州和联邦机构限制他们获取最新数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Native-American-public-health-officials-are-stuck-in-data-blind-spot.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Native-American-public-health-officials-are-stuck-in-data-blind-spot.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcbbd648-4a7d-447c-ba65-2c9848565c5e Tue, 06 Aug 2024 07:01:26 -0400 Native American public health officials are stuck in data blind spot
MIP Discovery 更名为 Tozaro，完成支持细胞和基因治疗病毒载体分析和纯化的转型Tozaro 合理设计的智能聚合物亲和试剂提供新颖的分析和纯化解决方案，以增强细胞和基因治疗中病毒载体的开发和制造。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/MIP-Discovery-rebrands-as-Tozaro-as-it-completes-transition-to-supporting-cell-and-gene-therapy-viral-vector-分析和纯化.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/MIP-Discovery-rebrands-as-Tozaro-as-it-completes-transition-to-supporting-cell-and-gene-therapy-viral-vector-分析和纯化.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1916fef7-ef4e-4837-a578-657732f4c7a0 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 06:04:00 -0400 MIP Discovery rebrands as Tozaro as it completes transition to supporting cell and gene therapy viral vector analytics and purification
“我的手机有时让我焦虑”：研究调查了智能手机使用问题与焦虑、睡眠和抑郁之间的关联研究人员确定了英国青少年中智能手机使用问题 (PSU) 与焦虑、抑郁和失眠之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/My-phone-sometimes-makes-me-anxious-Study-investigates-associations- Between-problematic-smartphone-usage-and-anxiety-sleep-and-抑郁症.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/My-phone-sometimes-makes-me-anxious-Study-investigates-associations- Between-problematic-smartphone-usage-and-anxiety-sleep-and-抑郁症.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d70793af-f9c1-4a3c-a871-7690e2807771 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 05:34:00 -0400 'My phone sometimes makes me anxious': Study investigates associations between problematic smartphone usage and anxiety, sleep, and depression
